remarks: Theorem to add distinct quantifier to atomic formula.  (This theorem demonstrates the induction basis for ~ ax-5 considered as a metatheorem.  Do not use it for later proofs - use ~ ax-5 instead, to avoid reference to the redundant axiom ~ ax-c16 .)  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-1993.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ax5eq $p |- ( x = y -> A. z x = y ) $.
$d x z $.
$d y z $.
